title: Advanced Course for Strengthening Pre-Design Technology Research Competencies in Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Cultivating practical pre-skills in technology research through flipped learning and workshop-integrated education in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently navigate prior technology resources across multiple engineering fields (mechanical/electrical/biomedical) in a mobile environment
Learners can distinguish and apply at least three types of resources (patents, papers, technical reports) to design problems
Learners can reflectively report prior technology analysis results within 200 characters through flipped learning content and workshop practice

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
